children.text: kalau player jalan dan player di lantai -> set animation run
kalau player berhenti dan player di lantai -> set animation idle
kalau player lompat -> set animation jump
kalau player jatuh dari lompat -> set animation fall
kalau player mendarat-> set animation kembali ke idle
when bullet shell is on the ground set immovable(make bullet shell not fall)

actions.text: meletakkan animasi senjata di imagepoint soldier obj_player

children.text: kalau left button mouse di tekan & klik
dan variable is_Shooting = 0 maka, call function wepType, wepTimer, set variable is_Shooting = 1
Destroy the particles after their animation is done to prevent CPU overload.

actions.text: spawn muzle flash = efek percikan api di ujung senjata
spawn muzle flash = efek percikan api di ujung senjata

children.text: jeda antara tiap bullet yang dihasilkan
kalau penemy moving set animasi ke walk
ketika enemy sudah dibuat set pilih direction random , kiri atau kanan
jika direction enemy adalah kiri enemy simulasi pressing left dan set mirrored
jika direction enemy adalah kanan enemy simulasi pressing right dan set not mirrored
